name: @gamely/prometheus-cli
description: Lua Obfuscator written in pure Lua (distributed as npm node-js)

scripts.prebuild2: node scripts/copy.js && npx gly-cli bundler build/cli.lua && node scripts/deflate.js
scripts.build: npx bun build --entrypoint src/cli.ts --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/cli.js --minify
